questions.question_text: Which two hashing distribution algorithms are available for an engineer when working with multichassis EtherChannels? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
These are not correct. Answers are B and E (src-dst-port & src-dst-mac). See the article covering VSS architecture:
https://www.ciscolive.com/c/dam/r/ciscolive/us/docs/2015/pdf/BRKCRS-3035.pdf
a contract is the correct answer

questions.question_text:
An engineer has been requested to utilize a method in an ACI network that will ensure only permitted communications are transmitted between each End Point
Group tier in a three tier application. Which element would be utilized to accomplish this within the fabric?

discussion.content:
I believe it is correct. Check https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/interfaces_modules/services_modules/ace/vA5_1_0/configuration/getting/started/guide/ace_module_gsg/rbac.html

"User roles determine user privileges, such as the commands that the user can enter and the actions the user can perform in a particular context."

comments.content:
I think B&C

Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) is a method of restricting or authorizing system access for users based on user roles and locales

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/unified_computing/ucs/sw/gui/config/guide/1-4/UCSM_GUI_Configuration_Guide_1_4_chapter9.html

questions.question_text: What are the two main elements used by RBAC to provide secure access within an Enterprise? (Choose two.)
While designing quality of service policies, which two types of traffic must be prioritized as management traffic? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
I think B&D

Dont think radius needs QoS

questions.question_text: During an upgrade of an existing data center, a network team must design segmentation into existing networks. Due to legacy applications, the IP addresses cannot change. Which firewall deployment model meets these requirements?

comments.content: Segmentation can mean adding zones, it doesn't mean multiple tenants. I think C is correct too.
